article_title: Medicaid expansion makes sense for Alaska's health and economy
article_text: As a hospital trustee, I can affirm that hospitals continually struggle to provide the best possible care at the lowest cost. This is a constant and endless quest. But we must do more. We must advocate for the generous federal matching funds linked to expansion that will bring more than a billion dollars into our state. And we must champion efforts to level the playing field with other states that have embraced expansion and accepted this federal support.

article_metadata.description: OPINION: Alaska has much to gain and nothing to lose with a Medicaid expansion program.

og.description: OPINION: Alaska has much to gain and nothing to lose with a Medicaid expansion program.
og.title: Medicaid expansion makes sense for Alaska's health and economy

article_summary:
And we must champion efforts to level the playing field with other states that have embraced expansion and accepted this federal support.
As a hospital trustee, I can affirm that hospitals continually struggle to provide the best possible care at the lowest cost.
We must advocate for the generous federal matching funds linked to expansion that will bring more than a billion dollars into our state.
This is a constant and endless quest.
But we must do more.
